mapper.select: SELECT courseNo, courseName, courseTime, courseDuration, courseIntegral, coursePrice, courseDesc, a.employeeName employeeNameCoach, a.employeePhone employeePhoneCoach, b.employeeName employeeNameManager, b.employeePhone employeePhoneManager FROM course INNER JOIN employee a ON course.employeeNo = a.employeeNo INNER JOIN manager ON course.managerNo = manager.managerNo INNER JOIN employee b ON manager.employeeNo = b.employeeNo limit #{page},#{size}
Select COUNT(*) as dataTotal from course

select courseNo, courseName, courseTime, courseDuration, courseIntegral, coursePrice, courseDesc, a.employeeName employeeNameCoach, a.employeePhone employeePhoneCoach, b.employeeName employeeNameManager, b.employeePhone employeePhoneManager from course INNER JOIN employee a ON course.employeeNo = a.employeeNo INNER JOIN manager ON course.managerNo = manager.managerNo INNER JOIN employee b ON manager.employeeNo = b.employeeNo where course.employeeNo = employee.employeeNo and (courseName like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or courseDuration like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or employeeName like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')) limit #{page},#{size};

select COUNT(*) as dataTotal from course INNER JOIN employee a ON course.employeeNo = a.employeeNo INNER JOIN manager ON course.managerNo = manager.managerNo INNER JOIN employee b ON manager.employeeNo = b.employeeNo where course.employeeNo = employee.employeeNo and (courseName like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or courseDuration like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or employeeName like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%'))
SELECT coursePrice FROM course WHERE courseNo = #{courseNo}
